profile.headline: Who We Are
profile.intro: Valment Partners turns process and data signals into measurable business value. We apply a disciplined approach—evidence-based discovery, value-driven prioritization, and lightweight governance—to make improvements both impactful and sustainable. Founded by practitioners with deep expertise in SAP transformations, data platforms, and enterprise architecture.
profile.mission: Our mission is simple: make business value visible, trackable, and sustainable. Whether you're optimizing SAP processes, modernizing your architecture, or governing AI adoption, we apply the same disciplined methodology to ensure execution and results.
profile.approach: We typically engage part-time and advisory, designed to strengthen your internal capability rather than create dependency. Most engagements are 0.5-2 days per week, focused on discovery sprints, portfolio management, and fractional leadership.
profile.experience: Global experience across Europe, Asia, and North America in manufacturing, automotive, technology, and professional services sectors.
